errors.error: 存取規範不允許使用 namespace 屬性。 You can not use both an access specifier (such as private or public) and a namespace attribute on a definition.

找不到 namespace，或它不是編譯時期常數。
The namespace is either unknown or is an expression that could have different values at run time. Check that you are spelling the namespace correctly and that its definition is imported correctly.
super 運算式只能在類別實體方法內使用。
super 陳述式只能在類別實體建構函式內使用。 You cannot use the super statement within static members. You can use the super statement only within class instances.
屬性無效。
override 屬性只能用於類別屬性定義。 You cannot use the override keyword within a function block.
virtual 屬性只能用於類別屬性定義。 You cannot use the virtual attribute when you declare a property that does not belong to a class (for example, when you declare a variable within a function block).
static 屬性只能用於類別中的定義。
private 屬性只能用於類別屬性定義。

不再支援 intrinsic 屬性。
ActionScript 3.0 does not support the intrinsic keyword.
基底類別為 final。 The superclass cannot be extended because it is marked as final.
找不到基底類別 %s 的定義。
類別定義重複：%s。
標示為 override 的方法必須覆寫另一個方法。

函數定義重複。
You cannot declare more than one function with the same identifier name within the same scope.
無法覆寫 final 存取子。

覆寫不相容。 A function marked override must exactly match the parameter and return type declaration of the function it is overriding. It must have the same number of parameters, each of the same type, and declare the same return type. If any of the parameters are optional, that must match as well. Both functions must use the same access specifier (public, private, and so on) or namespace attribute as well.

正在覆寫未標示為 override 的函數。 If a method in a class overrides a method in a base class, you must explicitly declare it by using the override attribute, as this example shows: 
public override function foo():void{};
無法重新定義 final 方法。 The method cannot be extended because it is marked as final in the base class.
建構函式的函數必須是實體方法。
函數無法同時為 static 及 override。
函數無法同時為 static 及 virtual。
函數無法同時為 final 及 virtual。

必須指定變數引數陣列的名稱。 The ...(rest) parameter definition specifies that all values supplied after ...(rest) are collected into any array. You must specify a name for the array, as in the expression function foo(x,...(rest)).
不支援 virtual 變數。
不能使用 native 變數。
變數無法同時為 final 及 virtual。
Package 不能巢狀化。
找不到 break 陳述式的目標。
找不到 continue 陳述式的目標。
標籤定義重複。
無法呼叫屬性。
this 關鍵字不能用於靜態方法中。它只能用於實體方法、函數結束項和全域程式碼中。 You cannot use the this keyword within a static member, because this would have no context.
未定義的 namespace。
Interface 方法 %s 於 namespace %s 內尚未被類別 %s 實作。
找不到 Interface %s。

找不到 Type，或它不是編譯時期常數：%s。 The class used as a type declaration is either unknown or is an expression that could have different values at run time. Check that you are importing the correct class and that its package location has not changed. Also, check that the package that contains the code (not the imported class) is defined correctly (for example, make sure to use proper ActionScript 3.0 package syntax, and not ActionScript 2.0 syntax).

The error can also occur if the class being referenced is not defined in a namespace that is in use or is not defined as public:

public class Foo{}

If you are using Flex™ Builder™ 2 and the class is in a library, make sure to set the class path for the project.

參數初始設定式不明，或它不是編譯時期常數。
The value used as the default value for the parameter is either undefined or could have different values at run time. Check that the initializer is spelled correctly, and that the initializer value isn't an expression that could result in different possible values at run time.
對指定為常數的變數的指定不合法。
無法指定給非參考值。
傳回值必須是未定義的。 You are attempting to use the return statement within a method that has a declared return type void.

常數初始設定式不明，或它不是編譯時期常數。
The value used to initialize the constant is either undefined or could have different values at run time. Check that the initializer is spelled correctly, and that the initializer value isn't an expression that could result in different possible values at run time.
存取子類型必須相符。

setter 定義的傳回類型必須是未指定的或虛值 (Void)。 You cannot specify a return value for a setter function. For example, the following is invalid: 
public function set gamma(g:Number):Number;

The following is valid:

public function set gamma(g:Number):void;
屬性是唯寫的。

屬性是唯讀的。 This property is defined through a getter function, which allows you to retrieve that property's value. There is no setter function defined for this property, however, so it is read-only.

In the following example, line 3 generates an error because there is no setter function defined for xx: 

class D { function get xx() { return 22; } }
var d:D = new D();
d.xx = 44; // error, property is read-only

呼叫可能未定義的方法 %s (透過靜態類型 %s 的參考)。
You are calling a method that is not defined.
無法開啟檔案：%s。

中繼資料無效。
This metadata is unrecognized.
中繼資料屬性不能包含超過一個元素。

%s 類型值以隱含方式強制轉型成不相關的類型 %s。
You are attempting to cast an object to a type to which it cannot be converted. This can happen if the class you are casting to is not in the inheritance chain of the object being cast. This error appears only when the compiler is running in strict mode.
無法開啟包含的檔案：%s。

語法錯誤：需要定義或指示詞。
Check the syntax in the line.

語法錯誤：屬性 %s 之後必須是定義關鍵字 (例如函數)，而不是 %s。 This error will occur if the author forgets to use the "var" or "function" keyword in a declaration. 
public int z;// should be 'public var z:int;'
This error might also occur when the compiler encounters an unexpected character. For example, the following use of the trace() function is invalid, because of the missing parentheses (the correct syntax is trace("hello")): 
trace "hello"

語法錯誤：namespace 之前必須是 xml。 The correct statement syntax is default xml namespace = ns. Either the keyword xml (note the lowercase) is missing or an incorrect keyword was used. For more information, see the default xml namespace directive.
語法錯誤：需要 catch 或 finally 子句。
語法錯誤：不允許使用沒有 'in' 運算子的 'each' 關鍵字。
語法錯誤：識別名稱之前必須有左括號。
標籤必須是簡單的識別名稱。
super 運算式必須包含一個運算元。
需要遞增或遞減的運算子。
括號內必須是單一運算式。

語法錯誤：未預期的 %s。 The line of code is missing some information. In the following example, some expression (such as another number) needs to be included after the final plus sign: 
var sum:int = 1 + 2 + ;
語法錯誤：%s 之前必須有分號。
語法錯誤：程式結尾後出現額外字元。
語法錯誤。
語法錯誤：字串常值必須在斷行符號之前結束。
語法錯誤：字串常值必須在斷行符號之前結束。
語法錯誤：在到達字串常值的結束引號之前，輸入便已結束。
語法錯誤。
語法錯誤：XML 沒有相符的開始和結束標記。
無法刪除 super 子系。

namespace 定義重複。
You defined the namespace more than once. Delete or modify the duplicate definition.
%s

指定的目標必須是參考值。
You can assign a value to a variable, but you cannot assign a value to another value.

遞增的運算元必須是參考。
The operand must be a variable, an element in an array, or a property of an object.

遞增運算元無效。
The operand must be a variable, an element in an array, or a property of an object.

遞減運算元無效。
The operand must be a variable, an element in an array, or a property of an object.

需要運算式。 An expression is missing in a part of the code. For example, the following produces this error (there is a condition missing from the if statement: 
var x = (5 > 2) ? 
trace(x)
遺失 XML 標記名稱。
檔案 %s 不是有效的 ABC 檔案。

可能導致無限遞迴，因為此檔案包括：%s。 A file that is included in the source being compiled contains other include statements that would cause an infinite loop. For example, the following files. a.as and b.as, generate this error because each file tries to include the other.

File a.as contains the following, which attempts to include the file b.as: 

import foo.bar.baz;
include "b.as"
trace(2);

File b.as contains the following, which attempts to include the file a.as: 

include "a.as"

在 %s 中偵測到循環類型參考。 A class is trying to extend a superclass. For example, class A cannot extend class B if B inherits from A: 
class a extends b { }
class b extends a { }
public 屬性只能用於套件內部。
internal 屬性只能用於套件內部。
使用者定義的 namespace 屬性只能用於類別定義的最上層。

靜態類型 %s 的值以隱含方式強制轉型成可能不相關的類型 %s。 You are using a value that is not of the expected type and no implicit coercion exists to convert it to the expected type.

Perhaps you are using a supertype where a subtype is expected. For example: 

class A {}
var a:A = new A(); 
class B extends A { function f() }
var b : B = a // error

The last statement generates an error because it attempts to assign an object of type A to a variable of type B.

Similarly, the following defines the foo() function, which takes a parameter of type B. The statement foo(a); generates an error because it attempts to use a parameter of type A: 

function foo(x:B) { }
foo(a);

Also, the following statement generates an error because the returned value for foo2() must be type B: 

function foo2():B { return new A(); }

存取可能未定義的屬性 %s (透過靜態類型 %s 的參考)。 You are attempting to access a property that does not exist for the specified object. For example, the following code generates this error because an int object does not have a property named assortment: 
var i:int = 44;
var str:String = i.assortment;
This error appears only when the compiler is running in strict mode.

存取未定義的屬性 %s。 You are attempting to access an undefined variable. For example, if the variable huh has not been defined, a call to it generates this error: 
huh = 55;
This error can appear only when the compiler is running in strict mode.
getter 定義必須沒有參數。
setter 定義只能有一個參數。
setter 定義不能包含選擇性參數。

getter 定義的傳回類型不能是虛值 (Void)。
A getter function simulates a variable. Because variables cannot be of type void, you cannot declare getter functions to return type void.
定義在 Interface 中的方法不能包含主體。
函數不包含主體。

%s 屬性已經多次指定。 You specified an attribute more than once in the same statement. For example, the statement public static public var x; generates this error because it specifies that the variable x is public twice. Delete duplicate declarations.

Interface 定義重複：%s。
Change or delete the duplicate definitions.
建構函式不能指定傳回類型。
類別不能巢狀化。
final 屬性只能用於定義在類別中的方法。
native 屬性只能配合函數定義使用。
動態屬性只能配合類別定義使用。
語法錯誤: %s 是無效類型。

引數個數錯誤。需要 %s 個。 The function expects a different number of arguments than those you provided. For example, the following defines function goo, which has two arguments: 
class A { static function goo(x:int,y:int) 
{ return(x+y); } }

The following statement would generate an error because it provides three arguments: 

A.goo(1,2,3);
引數個數錯誤。不能超過 %s 個。
不允許必要的參數出現在選擇性參數之後。
不允許在 Interface 中出現變數宣告。
指定於 ...rest 參數定義關鍵字後面的參數只能是 Array 資料類型。
類別只能擴充另一個類別，不能擴充 Interface。

Interface 只能擴充其它的 Interface，但是 %s 為類別。
You are attempting to have the interface extend a class. An interface can only extend another interface.
override 屬性只能用於定義在類別中的方法。

Interface 方法 %s 於 namespace %s 內用類別 %s 中不相容的簽名實作。
Method signatures must match exactly.
native 方法不能包含主體。 You cannot use native because it is a reserved keyword.
建構函式不能是 getter 或 setter 方法。
未指定 AS 原始檔案。
return 陳述式不能用於靜態初始化程式碼中。
protected 屬性只能用於類別屬性定義。
已繼承定義 %s 於 namespace %s 中發生衝突。
建構函式只能宣告為 public。
定義只能指定 public、private、protected 或 internal 其中之一。
存取子不能在其它函數中巢狀化。
Interface 不能使用新的運算子初始化。
Interface 成員不能宣告為 public、private、protected 或 internal。
語法錯誤：函數主體前面遺失左邊大括弧 ({)。
return 陳述式不能用於套件初始化程式碼中。
native 屬性不能用於 Interface 定義。 You cannot use native because it is a reserved keyword.
每一個定義只能使用一個 namespace 屬性。
方法 %s 與從 Interface %s 繼承的定義發生衝突。
Interface 屬性 %s 無效。
不允許在 Interface 中出現 namespace 宣告。

函數 %s 的指定不合法。 You are attempting to redefine a function. For example, the following defines the function topLevel() to print the word "top". The second statement generates an error because it assigns a different return value to the function: 
function topLevel() { trace("top"); }
topLevel = function() { trace("replacement works in ~");} // error
不允許在 Interface 方法上出現 namespace 屬性。
namespace 初始設定式必須是常值字串或其它 namespace。
找不到定義 %s。
標籤定義無效。
比較靜態類型 %s 的值和可能不相關的類型 %s。 This error is enabled in strict mode.
return 陳述式不能用於全域初始化程式碼中。
嘗試存取無法存取的屬性 %s (透過靜態類型 %s 的參考)。
:Object is temporarily out of service.Use :* instead.
呼叫可能未定義的方法 %s。 This error appears only when the compiler is running in strict mode.
基底類別 %s 的向前參考。
Package 不能當作值使用：%s。
不相容的 %s 類型預設值，該值必須是 %s。
此 switch 包含一個以上的預設值，但是只允許使用一個預設值。
類別 %s 的指定不合法。

嘗試刪除固定屬性 %s。只能刪除以動態方式定義的屬性。 Delete removes dynamically defined properties from an object. Declared properties of a class can not be deleted. This error appears only when the compiler is running in strict mode.
找不到基底類別，或它不是編譯時期常數。
找不到 Interface，或它不是編譯時期常數。
不允許 namespace 定義中出現 static 屬性。
Interface 定義不能在類別或是其它 Interface 定義中巢狀化。
prototype 屬性無效。

嘗試存取無法存取的方法 %s (透過靜態類型 %s 的參考)。 You are either calling a private method from another class, or calling a method defined in a namespace that is not in use. If you are calling a method defined in an unused namespace, add a use statement for the required namespace.
語法錯誤：throw 之後必須是運算式。
類別 %s 不能擴充 %s，因為這兩種都與圖庫元件或主要時間軸有關聯。
不允許套件定義出現屬性。
內部錯誤：%s。
語法錯誤：for-in 初始設定式無效，只能出現 1 個運算式。
super 陳述式不能出現在 this、super、return 或 throw 陳述式之後。

存取未定義的屬性 %s (在套件 %s 中)。 You are attempting to access an undefined variable in a package. For example, if the variable p.huh has not been defined, a call to it generates this error: 
p.huh = 55;
This error can only appear when the compiler is running in strict mode.
基底類別 %s 中找不到預設的建構函式。 You must explicitly call the constructor of the base class with a super() statement if it has 1 or more required arguments.

找到 /*，但沒有對應的 */。
The characters '/*' where found, which indicate the beginning of a comment, but the corresponding characters, '*/', which indicate the end of the comment block, were not found.
語法錯誤: 應該使用左大括弧 ({) 或字串常值 ("")。
super 陳述式只能只能當作初始設定式建構函式中的最後項目使用。 You cannot use the super statement within a constructor. You can use the super statement only as the last item in the constructor initializer list.
this 關鍵字不能用於屬性初始設定式中。 You cannot use the this keyword within a property initializer.

組態值的初始設定式必須是編譯階段常數。
The initializer of a configuration value must be a value known at compile time. The initializer may be a constant string, number, or boolean, or a reference to another previously defined configuration value.

組態變數只能宣告為 const。
When defining a configuration variable, it must be declared as const.

必須在程式或套件的最上層宣告組態值。
A configuration value must be declared at the top level of a program or package.

名稱空間 %s 與組態空間名稱發生衝突。
A namespace may not have the same name as a configuration namespace.
精確度必須是介於 1 和 34 之間的整數。
不相容的版本: 無法參照定義 %s (在版本 %s 中從版本 %s 的程式碼引進)。
初始化無效: 轉換為類型 %s 將遺失資料。
